title: Participation Configuration
description: Configuration surface for participation gating and falloff behaviour across cooperative modes.

enabled.description: Global toggle controlling whether participation logic is active.

debugLog.description: Emit verbose participation diagnostics to the console when enabled.

modes.description: Per-mode tuning for participation emission strength, decay, and radius falloff.

strength.description: Relative amplitude applied when participating in this mode.

decay.description: Per-second decay factor applied to participation strength.

radius.description: Effective influence radius in pixels for this participation mode.
